entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
